ComicInfo.Title: Distant Thunder
ComicInfo.Summary: An entire medieval world will be forever changed when a spaceship crash-lands from a doomed planet. Monarchs will die, kingdoms will rise, and what seemed the end of the world for many…was only the beginning! An epic high-fantasy story set in a DC Universe where nothing is what it seems… From worldwide bestselling writer Tom Taylor (DCeased, Superman: Son of Kal-El) and acclaimed artist Yasmine Putri comes a generational tale of good and evil within a brand-new DCU!
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-07-17 12:18:17. [CVDB897154]
ComicInfo.Characters: Alfred Pennyworth, Batman, Black Lightning, Blue Devil, Detective Chimp, Green Arrow, Harley Quinn, Hippolyta, Jacob Pierce, John Constantine, Jor-El, King Shark, Lara Lor-Van, Lightning, Lois Lane, Superman, The Aerie, Thunder, Wonder Woman, Zala El
ComicInfo.Teams: Amazons of Themyscira, House of El
